entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:41 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 1:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %

Wind: NE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
